nodes.text: A space sector was under the rule of warlord Ugroth in the year 3966 BBY. In that year, the resurgent Sith Empire dispatched an Imperial force under the command of Sith Lord Darth Nyriss to conquer the region and subdue a potential uprising. At the time, Ugroth swore fealty to Nyriss, and Nyriss received a commemorative bust of Ugroth that she displayed in her residence. Her attaché, Sechel, later told the visiting Sith Lord Scourge about Ugroth's sector while explaining the history of the artifacts in Nyriss' stronghold.
Ugroth's sector was first mentioned in Drew Karpyshyn's 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, a tie-in to the BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
